SELECT p.pr_no, p.product_name, p.price, p.title, p.writer, p.upload_at, p.content, p.state, p.cat1_id, p.cat2_id, p.cat3_id, c1.cat1_name, c2.cat2_name, c3.cat3_name, p.viewcount, p.postcount, p.file1, p.file2, p.file3 FROM pr3 p LEFT JOIN category1 c1 ON p.cat1_id = c1.cat1_id LEFT JOIN category2 c2 ON p.cat2_id = c2.cat2_id LEFT JOIN category3 c3 ON p.cat3_id = c3.cat3_id WHERE p.pr_no = #{id}
